meanings.definition: A type of cured meat, typically made from pork shoulder.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat capicollas with cheese and crackers.
meanings.sent2: The deli always has fresh capicollas available for sandwiches.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, the capicollas were the first to disappear!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the capicollas filled the room, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The capicollas were so flavorful, they left a lasting impression on my taste buds.

meanings.definition: The plural form of capicolla, a type of Italian cold cut.
meanings.sent1: The party platter included various cold cuts, including capicollas.
meanings.sent2: In Italy, capicollas are a popular choice for antipasto platters.
meanings.sent3: The capicollas in the deli display looked like little meat roses.
meanings.sent4: The capicollas on the sandwich added a burst of flavor to each bite.
meanings.sent5: The capicollas were the star of the charcuterie board, drawing everyone's attention.
